channel.title: Coding/Making servers public Help
channel.description:
I'm sort of new to the whole coding thing, mainly like adding NPC's drops shops ect. I usually download servers and play on them. But I would like to create my own, can someone make a short guide on how to do so. I would also like to know how to make servers public, I use Hamachi right now but a lot of my friends are sketchy about downloading stuff to get onto a server. Can someone also help me with that.
Thank you for helping me, any advise is appreciated.

item.title: Coding/Making servers public Help
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

or if u go to runelocus.com and click some buttons and if u click something about coding it says these things about how to code … like u type in what npc u want to have drop it and then u type in the item code u want dropped and itll give u the code!

if moparscape had that … they would be 2x better than runelocus … rite now theyre only 1.5 x better than runelocus XD

Read full topic

item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Thanks, I’ll try it out

item.title: Coding/Making servers public Help
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

1st Learn Java: http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/
2nd Use rs2dv framework to code server: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,227037.0.html
3rd Run the Server
4th Tell your firends of IP and have fun

Read full topic
